item.title: The inevitable battle between the light side and the dark side... of this site
item.description: Recently, lots of platforms have added support for “Dark Mode”. Some of us are old enough to remember that there never used to be any such thing as “Light Mode” but I guess green screen terminals are a thing of the past. Anyway, I’d always set up this site to have light and dark mode CSS files, but there was no easy way to switch between them. I wanted to fix that.
